column4: Just brought a new UX32VD and now i want to install Ubuntu on it. I have read that UX32VD is only stable on kernel 3.4 and higher. Should i install 12.04 and build custom kernel or install 12.10 aplha?
You don't need to, we already build the mainline kernels and package them. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Kernel/MainlineBuilds
for you information I'm running 3.5 here and it's very smooth
